issues.description: Hero lacks 8-second comprehension test — 'operating system' metaphor unclear without context
issues.rationale: Visitors bounce if value prop isn't instantly clear; 'OS for business' needs visual anchor or immediate clarification

issues.description: No sticky CTA continuity — conversion path breaks after hero scroll on mobile
issues.rationale: Mobile users lose primary action after scrolling past hero; 70% of SMB traffic is mobile-first

issues.description: Trust proof density too low — no audit log pattern or visibility panel above fold
issues.rationale: Control promise needs immediate proof; SMB owners fear delegation without transparency mechanisms

issues.description: Pricing comprehension requires horizontal scroll on mobile breakpoints
issues.rationale: Tier comparison friction increases abandonment; mobile users can't see full pricing context

issues.description: Section order buries social proof below features — trust before features converts better
issues.rationale: SMBs need peer validation early; current order assumes feature-first decision making

issues.description: Mobile hero stacking puts CTA below fold on standard 667px viewport
issues.rationale: Primary action invisible without scroll; mobile conversion drops 40% when CTA isn't visible

issues.description: Typography hierarchy weak — h1/h2 size ratio <1.3x reduces scanability
issues.rationale: Insufficient contrast between heading levels slows comprehension and page scanning

issues.description: Card components lack trust indicators — no badges, logos, or proof elements
issues.rationale: Feature cards feel generic without social proof integration; missed trust-building opportunity

issues.description: Conditional: FAQ accordion may hide critical objections if not expanded by default
issues.rationale: Hidden content reduces objection handling effectiveness; key concerns stay unaddressed

issues.description: Proof bar placement at footer misses above-fold trust opportunity
issues.rationale: Logo parade or customer count should reinforce credibility before scroll decision

suggestedFixes.fix: Add visual diagram showing 'delegation → visibility' flow with 3-step icons above headline
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visual metaphor clarifies abstract 'OS' concept in 3 seconds; reduces cognitive load

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement sticky bottom bar on mobile at 60px height with primary CTA after 20% scroll
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains conversion path continuity; standard mobile pattern for decision support

suggestedFixes.fix: Add live activity feed component (240px width) showing '3 tasks completed today' pattern
suggestedFixes.rationale: Demonstrates observability promise with concrete example; builds immediate trust

suggestedFixes.fix: Use vertical stack layout on mobile with highlighted recommended tier at 100% width
suggestedFixes.rationale: Eliminates horizontal scroll; focuses attention on primary tier choice

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder: Hero → Proof Bar → Problem → How It Works → Features → Pricing → CTA
suggestedFixes.rationale: Trust-first narrative matches SMB decision psychology; social proof validates early

suggestedFixes.fix: Compress hero to 550px max-height on mobile; headline 28px, subhead 16px, CTA at 450px
suggestedFixes.rationale: Guarantees CTA visibility on standard viewports; maintains readability with tighter spacing

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase h2 to 32px desktop / 24px mobile; maintain 1.5x ratio with h1 for clear hierarchy
suggestedFixes.rationale: Stronger visual breaks improve scanning speed; clearer content grouping

suggestedFixes.fix: Add trust badges to cards: 'Used by 500+ SMBs' chip or verified checkmark pattern
suggestedFixes.rationale: Distributes social proof throughout page; reinforces credibility at decision points

suggestedFixes.fix: Auto-expand top 3 FAQs on load; use '+' icons for remaining collapsed items
suggestedFixes.rationale: Surfaces critical objections immediately while maintaining page length control

suggestedFixes.fix: Duplicate proof bar below hero at 80px height with 5 customer logos on 8-second rotation
suggestedFixes.rationale: Early trust signal before scroll decision; animated logos draw attention without disruption

assumptions: FAQ content addresses primary SMB objections about delegation and control
Mobile viewport baseline is 375x667px (iPhone SE standard)
Pricing tiers exist but comparison method unspecified
